name: the roads of apocalypse - free game
name_original: the roads of apocalypse - free game
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world you drive a vehicle in a dangerous and fierce competition. Here everything is allowed to win! Missile, dynamite, do not hesitate to shoot at your opponents!

Like racing games car with a good feeling of speed? You have the soul of a road warrior? Then this game is for you.

Each race allows you to earn points, so you can buy faster and more powerful vehicles.

Forward and may the best win!

characteristics

- 11 maps available
- 12 different vehicles with particular features
- Each race will allow you to earn points to buy new vehicles
- 3 different environments available
